TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Because there is no tourist hotel on the moon promoting scuba spelunking tours of them.

How do you land on the Mun in stock and still have fuel left to get back off ?

I don't sell it to the locals.

Why return from the Mun instead of owning it?

Because you forgot to bring all the equipment needed to set up a permanent base.

How many trips would it take to set up a permanent base?

None. You can do it right at your place.

Why do I want to sleep after lunch?

Siesta.

You live in Mexico?

Vice versa, on the opposite side of the planet.

Do the meteorologists collect the meteor showers?

Seeing as they vapourise in the atmosphere in most cases, I'd say we all do, in our lungs.

Would having a meteor shower remove all your dead skin?

It would remove all your skin, flesh included.

Why am I up so late?

That's not you are up so late, that's all of them are up so early.

If the jellyfish is a fish, and a crawfish is a fish, why the whale and the dolphin aren't?

Wow, really keeping true to the thread, check the direction that their tails move

Who combined a whale and a shark to make a Whaleshark?

Lack of choice.

Does the gesture "first stick two fingers (like "V") into my eyes then into yours" means "Poke out my eyes to stop seeing such a piece of shame like you!" ?

No. It means your a Stooge.

Who was the 4th Stooge?

The intermediate Stooge between the 3rd and the 5th ones.

Why "cheerleader", but "handkerchief" and which one is a boss?

You follow a LEADER off the cliff. A CHIEF tells you to walk off the cliff while staying safe.

So CHIEF is boss.

How come Deathclaws ignore DT?

To make you need to have guns.

Why do Kerbals explode into dust?

They're plants, and high-velocity impacts are how they reproduce. It's not dust, it's spores.

 

What's the most popular brand of rocket part on Kerbin?

BOOSTERS 

How do I get moar boosters

You say:

Spoiler

BOO!!!

 

Are  there three chairmen in a space capsule?

Nope, they are couch potatoes.

If light and radiation move faster than matter and we are all expanding out from the Big Bang, then how could we see the light from 13.8 billion years ago?

That's what youtube is for.

How did the matter of the Universe exist before Google?

Privately. It is a matter of privacy.

Will that word be understood in 100 years?

Yes, it will.
"matter" = "the person who takes care about mats"

Apple. Google.  Why not Microsoftle?

Because it is Le Microsoft.

Is MacroHard their XXX name?

It's their brand name for the premium users.

Why haven't they self-renamed into Millisoft, after getting thousand times bigger?

Because that is how they make their customers feel. (Milli being smaller than micro)

What is a stupid question?
